ys:
The optimal binary search tree for the given input of k=[1,2,3] and freq=[4,8,1] would be:

[2, 1, 3]

This is because the key value 2 is chosen as the root node due to its high frequency and being in the middle of the key array. Then the left child is 1 and the right child is 3. All key values are used in the optimal binary search tree.
